metadata.reset:
Press 4 buttons together for 10 seconds. The LED colors will turn red after 2 seconds for 2 seconds and turn green for another 2 seconds. Keyfob will send “Device Reset Locally Notification” command and reset to the factory default. (Red LED flashes fast means reset completely).
Remark: This is to be used only in the case of primary controller being inoperable or otherwise unavailable.
